title: Pool game
text: I really enjoy this pool game. All the rewards and prizes give the game alt of incentive to keep coming back. The only things that bug me are the constant pop up screens that get in the way of the tasks you have at hand like opening a prize box and at the exact comment you tap the screen you hit the pop up.  The other is when you have choose to play a certain table such as Sydney and that game has finished youâ€™re automatically set up to enter the maximum table for your full coin amount. When this has happened and I have accidentally entered a that table and on the unfortunate side have lost it all, It takes me along time to come back and play the game. I think it has been almost a year now. And I came back to play again and this is still a thing. Other then these two things. I love this game. It is by far the best pool game app I have ever played. No others come close. Thanks for the fun this game has brought me.

title: Bots, hacks, and straight up unfair
text: This game is a joke, obviously. I actually play pool in real life and can 100% say the balls donâ€™t react the same everytime in the game. If I have a straight line going directly to a ball and directly to a hole, hit from the bottom of the ball (the cue ball is suppose to reverse direction). The cue ball will continue forward and even go in an side direction. Furthermore, Iâ€™ve never seen anyone with more than a 60% win rate, I was at 59 before I deleted the game. And that was the highest Iâ€™ve seen, over 450 matches. Every time I star rate this game, my review gets removed. I even tried to play easy matches to raise the win rate and instead they kept giving me people over level 120 (I was level 30).
